short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show avatars in pull requests and issue pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will display large avatar pictures in your pull requests and issues list in Github. 
Ideal to quickly identify who created a pull request.

You can also *overwrite* avatars of any user with an image of your choosing. which can bring both fun and better readability in the pages where it is applied. 

Disclaimer : You are going to see your colleagues' faces... even more. ;)
